Catholic Church. Councils. Acta Conciliorum et epistolae decretales
Hardouin, Jean, 1646-1729
France. Conseil d'Etat
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 4 no. 67
metadata.publisher: A Utrecht : Chez Corneille Guil. Le Febvre
metadata.description: "Avis donné par Denis Leger, Pierre le Merre, & Nicolas Bertin ... " p. 8
"Publié par Nicolas Bertin, l'un des censeurs, qui a fait les notes. L'avertissement est de l'abbé J.-B. Cadry." Barbier

First intended to be published in 1722 as a supplement to Jean Hardouin's edition of the Councils of the Church, which had been suppressed by the Parlement of Paris at its original publication in 1715. In 1725 the Conseil d'Etat authorized publication of Hardouin's edition without the "Avis." Cf. "Avertissement" p. iii-xvi
French and Latin in parallel columns
Text of the "Avis des censeurs" (p. 1-97): Latin and French in parallel columns
"Arrest du Conseil d'etat du roy. Du 21. avril 1725. Extrait des registres du Conseil d'etat": p. 98-100
metadata.notes: No copyright found. No table of contents found. Damaged, stained pages and cover. Title on cover.
